1.6.name: wordpress/site-layout-customizer
1.6.description:
This new WordPress plugin allows you to create a custom front page and other pages. It will allow you to display your posts with different custom layouts. As an example it can make the posts on the front page look similar to a magazine or news website. The uses for it are many. It is easy to custom different layouts for your posts and pages.

See Live Example Page

http://1customize.com/?page_id=49

Some Features

  • Customize & theme your frontpage, page or post
  • Display Title, pictures, excerpt, categories, tags, biographic info, author, date for each post
  • Filter posts by category
  • Integrates nicely with many themes
  • Change width & height of thumbnail & image
  • Easy Customize Layout editor
  • Display posts with shortcode
  • Put text over images & thumbnails
  • All around plugin with many uses
